participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and friendly, she loves connecting with others who share her interests.
participant_1.background: My family migrated to America when I was five. I am in college now and want to be a teacher. My brother is in a metal band and travels the world. I will be graduating in September and hope to get a teaching job soon.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, he enjoys exploring his interests and takes a thoughtful approach to life.
participant_2.background: I am gay but I have not told my parents yet. I like comic books and anime. When I have free time, I sketch my favorite characters. I take things very literally. I play a lot of video games.

content.text: Hi there! What's your name?
Hello! I'm (user 2's name). It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read comic books, play video games, and watch anime.
Oh, cool! I love comic books and anime too. What are some of your favorite series?
I love One Piece, Naruto, and My Hero Academia. What are your favorites?
My favorites are Fullmetal Alchemist, Bleach, and Attack on Titan.
Those are great choices! I love all of those series.
Yeah, they're all so good. What do you like about anime and comics?
I love the stories and the characters. They're always so inspiring.
I know what you mean. They can make you feel like anything is possible.
Exactly! And they're so much fun to watch and read.
I agree! I can't get enough of them.
Me neither! What are your favorite video games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series, Mario Kart, and Super Smash Bros.
Oh, cool! I love all of those games too. I'm a big fan of Nintendo.
Me too! Nintendo makes the best games.
I agree! I'm so glad I met you. We have so much in common.
Me too! I'm looking forward to talking to you more.
Me too! I'm sure we'll be good friends.
